explains: n. 小艇；小型帆船；轻舟

sentences.en: Huck, I'll take you right to it in a skiff.
sentences.cn: 哈克，我马上带你划小船过去。

sentences.en: Tom Sawyer was in the skiff that bore Judge Thatcher.
sentences.cn: 汤姆·索亚与撒切尔法官同乘一条小艇。

sentences.en: I'll float the skiff down there, and I'll pull it back again all by myself.
sentences.cn: 我让小艇浮在那儿，然后自己把它拉回来。
